name: Understanding React State Like a Pro
description: State is at the heart of every React app. This article breaks down how state works, why it matters, and common mistakes beginners make.

name: Why JavaScript Closures Confuse Everyone
description: Closures feel confusing until they don’t. This post explains closures using real-world examples you can relate to.

name: A Practical Guide to Git for Students
description: Learn Git the right way: commits, branches, merge conflicts, and how teams actually use Git in real projects.

name: How CSS Flexbox Actually Works
description: Flexbox made layout easier, but many developers still use it without understanding it fully. Let’s fix that.

name: From Student to Software Engineer: What Matters Most
description: Grades matter, but skills matter more. This article discusses what actually helps you land your first dev job.

name: React useEffect Explained Without the Confusion
description: useEffect is powerful but often misused. Learn when and how to use it without breaking your app.

name: Building Better Habits as a Developer
description: Consistency beats motivation. This post focuses on small habits that make a big difference in the long run.

name: Understanding APIs Without the Jargon
description: APIs are everywhere. This article explains what APIs are and how frontend and backend communicate.

name: Why You Should Build Projects While Learning
description: Tutorials are useful, but projects teach you problem-solving. Here’s why building matters more than watching.

name: Common Mistakes New Developers Make
description: From over engineering to tutorial hell, this post highlights mistakes and how to avoid them early
